```{r setup}
library(narr)
library(tidyverse)
```

# Prepare Data

```{r}
d <- d <- readRDS('d_narr_cells.rds') %>%
  mutate(VisitDate = as.Date(VisitDate, format = '%m/%d/%y'), 
         start_date = VisitDate - lubridate::days(7), 
         end_date = VisitDate) %>% 
  rename(narr_cell_number = narr_cell)
```

# Add NARR data

```{r}
(d <- get_narr_data(d, narr_variables = c('air.2m', 'rhum.2m')))
```
